content.title: Awasiya Vidyala Yojana
content.details: It is often seen that children of construction workers stay with their parents at the work site. Due to poverty and lack of resources of the parents, such children are not able to take admission in any school or are not able to continue their education after taking admission. Realizing the need to start residential schools for such children of construction workers, a residential school scheme has been proposed. The objective of the scheme is to provide quality education to the children of registered construction workers in the age group of 6 to 14 years by providing them the facilities of primary, junior high school and secondary education. Initially, residential school scheme will be operated in districts Etawah, Bhadohi, Kannauj, Moradabad, Firozabad, Lalitpur, Bahraich, Ghaziabad, Kanpur, Azamgarh, Agra and Meerut. Later, based on the experiences and needs gained, this scheme will be expanded to other districts.
benefits: Free residential education for all registered construction workers' sons/daughters.
Free accommodation, clothing, food and other facilities available.
eligibility: Parent must be registered construction workers.
Child must be fall within the range of 6 to 14 years.
content.application_process: Offline. Applicant must visit the nearest labor office, Tehsildar of the concerned tehsil, or Block Development Officer of the concerned development block. Get the application form and fill it out completely. Attach required documents in the prescribed format and submit the application form in the same office.

faqs.question: What is this scheme about?
faqs.answer: 'Awasiye Vidyala Yojana' initiated by the Labor Department of the Uttar Pradesh State for the education of the construction worker.

faqs.question: What is the scheme benefits?
faqs.answer: Free residential education for all registered construction workers' sons/daughters. Free accommodation, clothing, food and other facilities available.

faqs.question: Who can get the scheme benefits?
faqs.answer: Parent must be registered construction workers.

faqs.question: What is the age eligibility of the child?
faqs.answer: Child must be fall within the range of 6 to 14 years.

faqs.question: What is the application process?
faqs.answer: Firstly applicant get register his/her self with labor department. Submit the application form with required documents to labor department.

faqs.question: What documents are required to get the benefits?
faqs.answer: Photocopy of registration certificate. Proof of deposit of contribution.

faqs.question: Is there any charges for the registration and application process?
Is there any educational fee need to be submit at the Atal Awasiya Vidyala?
How to get the application form?
faqs.answer: Forms can be downloaded from the nearest labor office, Tehsildar of the concerned tehsil, or Block Development Officer of the concerned development block.
